item.title: Style Guide Examples
item.description: Do not use words such as above or below to refer the reader to another section. Use the name of the specific subject/heading/figure/step in question. Search for instances of of the. Reword as and where you can for word economy. For example, The contents of the USERS table are used to… can be written as, The USERS table is used to…. Use the terms user and client to distinguish between the human user and the machine.
